Show / Hide Table of Contents

Namespace Figaro

Classes

BackupCloseArgs

The arguments to the OnErr

BackupConfig

Used to configure settings for backup operations.

Container

The Container class encapsulates a document container and its related indices and statistics.

ContainerConfig

Container configuration settings.

ContainerScopeException

This exception is thrown when a Container is disposed before it is closed.

DatabaseException

This exception is thrown when the underlying Berkeley database environment throws an error.

DBDeadlockException

Thrown when a lock is unavailable for an operation.

DBLockNotGrantedException

Thrown when a lock request was not granted by the database system.

DBSite

The replication site for Figaro High Availability (HA).

ErrEventArgs

Generated by the OnErr event.

FigaroEnv

The handle for a database environment - a collection including support for some or all of caching, locking, logging and transaction subsystems, as well as databases and log files. Methods of the FigaroEnv handle are used to configure the environment as well as to operate on subsystems and databases in the environment.

FigaroEnv.FigaroReplicationManager

The class used to control High Availability (HA) replication for the database environment.

FigaroEnvException

Some properties can be modified after opening, and some can't. Those that can't throw this exception.

FigaroEnvOutputException

Occurs when trying to use more than one messaging output methodology in FigaroEnv at a time.

FigaroException

Base exception for other exceptions in the Figaro library.

FigaroReplicationException

Thrown when an exception occurs within the High Availability (HA) or replication environment.

FigaroReplicationManager

The replication manager for Figaro High Availability (HA).

FigaroTransactionException

This exception is thrown whenever an error occurs when performing a transaction.

IndexingStrategy

A utility class geared toward aiding in the creation of indexes for Container objects.

IsAliveEventArgs

Generated by the OnIsAlive event.

KeyStatistics

Encapsulates statistical information about the number of keys in existence for a given index.

LeaseExpiredException

This exception is thrown when a replication lease expires.

LicenseException

This exception is thrown when a licensing issue occurs in the Figaro library.

LockStatistics

Locking subsystem statistical data.

LogConfiguration

Performs logging flag operations on the Figaro.

LogStatistics

Log statistics data.

MemoryPoolStatistics

Memory pool (buffer cache) subsystem statistics.

MemoryPoolStatisticsInfo

Memory pool statistics for each of the cache files.

MsgEventArgs

Generated by the OnMessage event.

MutexStatistics

Mutex statistics.

ProcessEventArgs

An System.EventArgs instance generated by the OnProcess event.

ProgressEventArgs

Generated by the OnProgress event.

QueryContext

Encapsulates the context within which a query is performed against a Container. The context includes namespace mappings, variable bindings, and flags that indicate how the query result set should be determined and returned to the caller.

ReplicationConfig

Replication configuration settings for the FigaroReplicationManager.

ReplicationHostAddress

The address of a replication site used by Figaro High Availability (HA).

ReplicationManagerStatistics

Replication management statistics for FigaroReplicationManager.

ReplicationViewArgs

The events generated by replication views in Figaro HA.

RunRecoveryException

Indicates that recovery procedures must be run against the database environment.

SharedMemoryLockException

Thrown when the shared memory region was locked and (repeatedly) unavailable in a FigaroEnv object.

SiteConfig

Configuration properties for a site in FigaroReplicationManager.

StackFrameEventArgs

The stack frame event arguments.

StackFrameExceptionEventArgs

Gets the stack frame exception event arguments.

TransactionStatistics

Transaction statistics.

UnsupportedPlatformException

Thrown when the operating system executing the Figaro assembly is not supported.

UpdateContext

Encapsulates the context within which update operations are performed against a Container.

VersionMismatchException

Thrown when the container version and the dbxml library version are not compatible.

XmlArguments

Used by implementers of XmlExternalFunction to access function arguments passed to the Execute(XmlManager, XmlArguments) method.

XmlData

A wrapper to the Dbt object found in Berkeley Db. This class represents untyped XML data and exists in support of XmlDocument and XmlValue.

XmlDebugListener

Allows the user to track the progress of a query as it executes.

XmlDocument

An XmlDocument is the unit of storage within a Container. A document consists of content, a name, and a set of metadata attributes.

XmlEnvEventArgs

The base for events generated by FigaroEnv

XmlException

This general exception is thrown when the underlying BDB XML engine throws an error.

XmlExternalFunction

The XmlExternalFunction class is used to implement XQuery extension functions in .NET Framework languages.

XmlIndexLookup

The XmlIndexLookup class encapsulates the context within which an index lookup operation can be performed on a Container object.

XmlIndexSpecification

Encapsulates the indexing specification of a container.

XmlInputStream

A forward-only stream used to read and write XML data.

XmlManager

Provides a high-level object used to manage various aspects of container, query, streaming, context, and transaction management.

XmlMetadataIterator

Provides an iterator over an XmlDocument's metadata. Metadata is set on a document with SetMetadata(String, String, XmlData). You can also use GetMetadataXmlData(String, String) or GetMetadataXmlValue(String, String) to return a specific metadata item.

XmlResults

Encapsulates the results of a query or other lookup operation.

XmlStackFrame

Provides stack trace information about an executing query to the methods of XmlDebugListener.

XmlTransaction

The handle for a transaction, encapsulating a Berkeley DbTxn object. Methods of the XmlTransaction class are used to abort and commit the transaction. XmlTransaction handles are provided to Container, XmlManager, and other objects that query and modify documents and containers in order to transactionally protect those database operations.

XmlValue

Encapsulates the value of a node in an Xml document. The type of the value may be any one of the enumerated types in the XmlValueType enumeration.

XmlValueException

This exception is thrown whenever the type of XmlResults result set is a XmlValue type, but an attempt is made to retrieve it as a different type.

XQueryException

Initializes a new instance of the XQueryException class. This exception is thrown when an XQuery operation throws an exception.

XQueryExpression

XQueryExpression represents a parsed XQuery expression, and is created by a call to Prepare(String, QueryContext).

XQueryResolver

Provides a base class that is used for file resolution policy. Implementations of this class are used for URI resolution, or for public and system id resolution. XQueryResolver implementations are identified for use using RegisterResolver(XQueryResolver).

Structs

EnvCacheSize

The size of the FigaroEnv cache.

EnvVersion

Version information of the Berkeley DB release used by the library.

FigaroProductInfo

General product information for the Figaro XML Database product installed.

LogSequenceNumber

A log sequence number which specifies a unique location in a log file.

MemoryPoolFileStatistics

Cache information for each file that makes up the memory pool.

ReplicationSite

Information about the sites configured within the replication manager.

TransactionInfo

Individual transaction information.

XmlIndex

A basic utility object for indexing.

Enums

BackupOptions

Figaro backup options.

ConfigurationState

Container configuration state settings.

ContainerState

The state of the container.

DeadlockDetectType

A list of lock requests to request in DeadlockDetectPolicy.

EnvConfig

Used by SetEnvironmentOption(EnvConfig, Boolean) to set the different FigaroEnv subsystems and settings for each of the following below.

EnvironmentEvent

Used to describe the Figaro events raised by the ProcessEventEnabled property.

EnvironmentRemoveAction

One or more actions to perform when removing an environment.

EnvironmentTimeoutType

Used to identify the type of FigaroEnv timeout setting.

EnvLogOptions

The logging options used to configure a FigaroEnv instance.

EnvOpenOptions

Specifies the subsystems that are initialized and how the application's environment affects Figaro file naming, among other things.

EvaluationType

Specifies the query evaluation type.

FeedbackEvent

The types of events that would generate progress events in the FigaroEnv.

FigaroExceptionCategory

Used by FigaroException to determine errors and error codes encountered during the course of operation.

FigaroProductEdition

The Figaro product edition in use.

GetAllDocumentOptions

Specifies the action to take when retrieving documents from a Container.

HighboundOperationLookup

The type of high bound operation to be performed against a range lookup for an XmlIndexLookup object.

IndexKeyType

Identifies what sort of queries the index supports.

IndexLookupOperation

The type of high bound operation to be performed against a range lookup for an XmlIndexLookup object.

IndexLookupOptions

The type of lookup operation.

IndexNodeType

Used to determine the type of data indexed in the container.

IndexPathType

Indicates what type of path the index should take with respect to identifying nodes to index.

LockStatisticOptions

Used in GetLockStatistics(Boolean) to determine which statistics to display as well as the option to reset values.

LogArchiveOptions

Used to select the types and attributes of log files returned.

LogConfigurationCategory

The log category to enable or disable.

LogConfigurationLevel

The log level to enable or disable.

ManagerInitOptions

One or more values to set during XmlManager instantiation.

NodeType

An enumerated list of possible node types that can be contained within an XmlValue object.

PrintMemoryPoolStatisticsOptions

Options for printing memory pool statistics.

PutDocumentOptions

One or more options for putting whole Xml documents in a Container object.

QueryOptions

One or more options for querying containers.

RecordAcknowledgmentPolicy

Some acknowledgment policies use the concept of an electable peer, which is a client capable of being subsequently elected master of the replication group.

ReindexOptions

One or more values to set for re-indexing containers.

ReplicationManagerStatus

The status of a remote replication site.

ReplicationSiteConnectionStatus

The connection status of the replication site.

ReplicationStartOptions

Replication Manager startup options.

ReplicationStatisticsOptions

Print options for displaying Figaro.FigaroReplicationManager statistics.

ReplicationViewOptions

Flags for whether the replication site is a partial or full replication view, or not a replication view at all.

ResultsType

Indicates what kind of object is to be returned from an XmlResults object.

RetrievalModes

One or more options for retrieving nodes and documents from the containers.

SalvageOptions

Salvage options to use when performing container verification.

StatPrintOptions

One or more actions to take against the statistics subsystem after retrieving system statistics.

TransactionStatus

The status of a transaction.

TransactionType

Configuration options that can be used throughout Figaro when using transactions.

VerboseOption

Informational and debugging messages in the message output.

XmlContainerType

Specifies the storage type of the container.

XmlDatatype

The basic data types recognized by IndexingStrategy.

XmlValueType

The XML data types of an XmlValue object.

Delegates

The event message handler for the OnErr event.

EnvIsAliveEventHandler

The event message handler for the OnIsAlive event.

EnvMessageEventHandler

The event message handler for the OnMessage event.

EnvProcessEventHandler

The event message handler for the OnProcess event.

EnvProgressEventHandler

The event message handler for the OnProgress event.

Delegate object for the Debug_Enter event.

XmlDebugListener.ErrorEventDelegate

Delegate object for the Debug_Error event.

XmlDebugListener.ExitEventDelegate

Delegate object for the Debug_Exit event.

XmlDebugListener.StartEventDelegate
